Sequence Information.Target Organism: Gram-positive bacteria:Lactobacillus plantarum, L. pentosus, L. curvatus, L. lindneri, Leuconostoc mesenteroides and Enterococcus faecalis.
Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: No hemolysis information or data found in the reference(s) presented in this entry
Sequence Information.Function: Bacteriocin with a narrow antibacterial spectrum. Has Antibacterial activity.
Sequence Information.Biophysicochemical properties: pH dependence (Stable from pH 5.5-8.5); Temperature dependence (Thermostable, activity is retained after incubation at 90degrees Celsius for 15 minutes).

Literature.Title: Isolation and characterization of plantaricin ASM1 a new bacteriocin produced by Lactobacillus plantarum A-1.
Literature.Author: Hata T, Tanaka R, Ohmomo S.
